data.comment: The first-half is under way at AFAS Stadion - Alkmaar kick-off to start the match.
Fredrik Midtsjo (Alkmaar) has received a first yellow card.
In the minute 21, Alkmaar move into a 1-0 lead through a Teun Koopmeiners header.
That's a fine assist from Bruno Martins Indi.
The ref's whistle signals the end of the first-half.
In the minute 46, The second half is underway in Alkmaar - Groningen with the kick-off.
Danny Buijs (Groningen) is making a first substitution, with Remco Balk replacing Tomas Suslov.
Fredrik Midtsjo (Alkmaar) leaves the pitch after receiving two yellow cards.
In the minute 62, Zakaria Aboukhlal is replacing Jesper Karlsson for the home team.
Goal! The away team draw level at 1-1 through Ahmed El Messaoudi.
Patrick Joosten instrumental with a fine assist.
In the minute 74, Goal! Ahmed El Messaoudi gives Groningen a 1-2 lead.
Great play from Jorgen Strand Larsen to set up the goal.
Pascal Jansen (Alkmaar) is making a second change, with Ferdy Druijf replacing the possibly injured Dani De Wit.
In the minute 78, Bruno Martins Indi is booked for the home team.
At AFAS Stadion, Patrick Joosten has been yellow-carded for the away team.
Groningen make their second substitution with Ramon-Pascal Lundqvist replacing Jorgen Strand Larsen.
In the minute 84, Danny Buijs is making the team's third substitution at AFAS Stadion with Mo El Hankouri replacing Patrick Joosten.
At AFAS Stadion, Bruno Martins Indi has been booked for the second time in this match. An early shower is now waiting!
That's full-time at AFAS Stadion. The final score is 1-2.
Calvin Stengs (Alkmaar) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
Wessel Dammers is replacing Gabriel Gudmundsson for Groningen at AFAS Stadion.
Owen Wijndal (Alkmaar) gets a yellow card.
Mo El Hankouri (Groningen) has been sent off!
